flawed_nl_solution:
By adding together Monday and Tuesday, Saah has 20+18= <<20+18=38>>38 pencils
On Wednesday, she buys 3 * 18= <<3*18=54>>54 pencils
All together, Sarah has 38+54= <<38+54=29>>29 pencils
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 92, not 29. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
